dcterms:creator: Andrew McCallum
Kamal Nigam
Jason D. M. Rennie
Kristie Seymore
dcterms:description: A citation network dataset where nodes correspond to manuscripts and edges represent citations. The node feature vector indicates the distribution of words in each paper's abstract, and the node label represents the domain of the paper.
dcterms:title: Cora

dcterms:creator: C. Lee Giles
Kurt D. Bollacker
Steve Lawrence
dcterms:description: A citation network dataset similar to Cora, where nodes correspond to manuscripts and edges represent citations. The node feature vector indicates the distribution of words in each paper's abstract, and the node label represents the domain of the paper.
dcterms:title: CiteSeer

dcterms:creator: Benedek Rozemberczki
Carl Allen
Rik Sarkar
dcterms:description: A social network dataset where nodes correspond to Twitch streamers and edges represent mutual followers. The node features contain a representation of the games played by the streamer, and the node label indicates whether the streamer streams mature content.
dcterms:title: Twitch

dcterms:creator: Oleksandr Shchur
Maximilian Mumme
Aleksandar Bojchevski
Stephan Günnemann
dcterms:description: An e-commerce co-purchase network dataset where nodes correspond to products and edges connect co-purchased products. The node features contain product reviews as a bag-of-words, and the node label indicates the product category.
dcterms:title: Amazon Photos (AMZN-P)

dcterms:creator: Oleksandr Shchur
Maximilian Mumme
Aleksandar Bojchevski
Stephan Günnemann
dcterms:description: An e-commerce co-purchase network dataset similar to Amazon Photos, where nodes correspond to products and edges connect co-purchased products. The node features contain product reviews as a bag-of-words, and the node label indicates the product category.
dcterms:title: Amazon Computers (AMZN-C)

dcterms:creator: Marinka Zitnik
Jure Leskovec
dcterms:description: A dataset containing a collection of graphs representing protein-protein interactions across different human tissues. The node features contain positional gene sets, motif gene sets, and immunological signatures, while the node label is a 121-dimensional vector corresponding to gene ontology sets.
dcterms:title: Protein-Protein Interactions (PPI)
